about_the_game:
This pack includes:

  • Sin "Huli" Yeou-bi hero unlock;
  • "Fire Dragon" suit;
  • Two handed japanese sword - odachi;
  • 700 Crowns.

The exact place and date of birth are unknown. At the age of about five years old, she was found in the mountains of Seobeksan, South Korea. The girl grew up in a foster family, where she was loved and cared. Foster parents began to notice the unnatural behavior of animals around the child: dogs understood her without words, butterflies sat on her hands, fireflies surrounded her during walks, and children with whom she did not get along were often stung by hornets and wasps.

Ability: "Swarm of Light"
Spawn a swarm of fireflies that search for enemies in a 85-meter radius and reveal their position to you for the next 20 seconds. Be careful when you use it though, as the direction in which the fireflies came can tell your enemies about your position.

Golden Crowns is an in-game currency that can be spent on:

  • Battle Pass which allows you to pass additional challenges and get unique rewards;
  • Unique outfits and gestures in the in-game store;
  • Exchange to Eternal Grace, which is the main currency accepted in the shadow realm, required for obtaining new mystic powers.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same content!
  • Available only for Windows. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account, or the mobile version.
detailed_description:
This pack includes:

  • Sin "Huli" Yeou-bi hero unlock;
  • "Fire Dragon" suit;
  • Two handed japanese sword - odachi;
  • 700 Crowns.

The exact place and date of birth are unknown. At the age of about five years old, she was found in the mountains of Seobeksan, South Korea. The girl grew up in a foster family, where she was loved and cared. Foster parents began to notice the unnatural behavior of animals around the child: dogs understood her without words, butterflies sat on her hands, fireflies surrounded her during walks, and children with whom she did not get along were often stung by hornets and wasps.

Ability: "Swarm of Light"
Spawn a swarm of fireflies that search for enemies in a 85-meter radius and reveal their position to you for the next 20 seconds. Be careful when you use it though, as the direction in which the fireflies came can tell your enemies about your position.

Golden Crowns is an in-game currency that can be spent on:

  • Battle Pass which allows you to pass additional challenges and get unique rewards;
  • Unique outfits and gestures in the in-game store;
  • Exchange to Eternal Grace, which is the main currency accepted in the shadow realm, required for obtaining new mystic powers.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same content!
  • Available only for Windows. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account, or the mobile version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 or better, AMD Radeon 77XX or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note, that for Nvidia GPUs second digit matters a lot, so 640 or 730 are much slower than 560!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 or better, AMD Radeon 77XX or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note, that for Nvidia GPUs second digit matters a lot, so 640 or 730 are much slower than 560!
